paper_abstract: A frequency-weighted parameter extraction method based on the performance evaluation criterion weighted error spectral power ratio is proposed. Performance of models extracted using the normalized mean square error are compared to the performances of models extracted using the WESPR. The results show an increase in performance with a decrease in model complexity. (C) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc Int J RF and Microwave CAE 20 200-208. 2010
paper_title: Parameter Extraction and Performance Evaluation Method for Increased Performance in RF Power Amplifier Behavioral Modeling
